text: Soni chilikati chao (cha wandu wa ku Mbepo ni wa ku Moto), chipakawe pana uwigo (chachili chikwesya), soni pachanya pa chikwesya, paachiwa pana wandu (wakulandana itendo yao yambone ni yakusakala) wachachiwa ali nkwamanyilila wosope (wandu wa ku Mbepo ni wa ku Moto) ni imanyilo yao. Ni tachawilanga wandu wa ku Mbepo (achitiji): “Ntendele uwe kukwenu.” Chachiwa nkanajijinjile (Mbepojo) nambo ali akwete tama (janti tajijinjile)
